Get a profile using wallet, talent id or account identifier

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"account_source","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["farcaster","github","wallet"]},"description":"The source of the account"},{"name":"X-API-KEY","in":"header","description":"Your Talent Protocol API key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Get profile using github handle","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"profile":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The uuid of the profile"},"bio":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The bio of the profile"},"display_name":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The display name of the profile"},"image_url":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The image url of the profile"},"location":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The location of the profile"},"name":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The name of the profile"},"human_checkmark":{"type":"boolean","description":"The flag that indicates if the profile is from human"},"onchain_since":{"type":["string","null"],"format":"date-time","description":"The timestamp of when the profile did the first onchain transaction"},"ens":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"The ENS name of the profile"},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","description":"A tag describing the profile"}}}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
